p: Figure 1 shows the CONSORT diagram for this study. There were no differences in patient characteristics between the parental TRICOLORE and TR cohorts (Table S1). The PFS and OS in the TR cohort were almost the same as those in the entire TRICOLORE cohort (Figure S1). In the clinicopathological and molecular background (Table 1), we found a significant between‐group difference only in aCRCS.
